All it took to learn it were a combination of the right circumstances and pure, stubborn willpower!
Hmm... This sounds kinda like some Earth Kingdom superiority stuff. I'm not sure about using my bending for such a cause...
Yeah, I'm kinda used to it by now. But it's not always a good thing, you know. Like sometimes you see the people who you... really don't wanna see naked.

Oh, y'know... Other people's naked bodies under their clothing, their heart rates increase, every throbbing in their loins, men trying to hide their stiffies. The usual. Though it's a little different in your case, you being metal and all.
Yeah, I'm pretty awesome, aren't I? I'm the first blind girl to do this in my world. Well, ask away! I know you want to.
You don't need to lie around me, Bug Girl! Even if you're nervous, I can tell when you're lying, remember?
I'm sure it would, Doctor Death! There are many practical uses for bending, but I just like to use it to go poundy-poundy!
I don't know about power-enhancing gemstones, but I have a bracelet made of space rock. You should see what I can do with it!
Uh, yeah, I was gonna ask you about that, actually...
Hey, thanks. Maybe I'll catch one of your shows if you come to the Earth Kingdom!
Spite is a pretty great motivator, isn't it? Just being able to tell people, "You thought I couldn't do it, but I did it anyway!"
Well, if you're saying I don't look good, then I'm open to suggestions, o great Fashion Sifu!
Yeah, metalbending is pretty sweet. I can use it in fighting and it makes for a neat party trick!
True. Part of what we learn in earthbending is to wait and listen to the earth around us, to anticipate what will be happening.
It's my best talent! Well, second best. Third best? One of my best. What can I say? I'm a girl of many talents!
Ha! Sure, whatever you say, but we both know the truth.
Yeah, I'd be down for that, Doctor Death. Maybe once it's my turn to go at it, assuming I don't beat all the rest of you!
Well, if there's one thing I have learned from working with incredibly skilled nonbenders, it's that it doesn't matter what you have as much as what you make of it. Take that however you want.
In many ways, yeah! Though it's definitely a power that has limits. For example, I can't sense anything--or anyone--that's off the ground, like if it's floating in midair like ~flies~ over here.
OW! No! What? Why would you say that? I don't even have balls and that made me hurt!
I know, I know. I couldn't help it. Besides, am I wrong?
Hey, no problem. So, bending really doesn't exist in your world? That's gotta stink.
Oh, is there ever! We went on so many crazy adventures together. I know all about Aang and can give you all the juicy details you need to know.
Ha! Boy, I know all about them. Katara would freak if she knew I was telling you, though! Of course, she wouldn't be caught dead here to begin with.
Ha! You want info about them, you came to the right girl! Sokka, for instance. Sure, he's a genius, but he can't talk to girls at all! And he snores.
One thing I've tried with past partners is blindfolding them. Not being able to see really lets you focus on other stuff, like the sounds, the smells, the feeling of my body on theirs.
I can tell you're getting worked up by this, Chatterbox. I'll make sure to try that in the future.
Well, it used to be even more. My parents split up after I ran away, but my dad's still got a plant he's running, and I'm of course famous for helping the Avatar end the war.
I don't doubt it! I am pretty awesome, even though I don't know what type of people go to your school.
Ugh, tell me about it. Something about the outside being too dangerous for a blind girl. Or at least that's how my parents justified it. But I showed them!
Even more so! For example, if I had reason to believe you were cheating at this game, I could bury you into the earth. But you wouldn't give me reason to believe that, right?
In many ways, yeah! Though it's definitely a power that has limits. For example, I can't sense anything that's off the ground, like if it's floating in midair.
Yeah, actually, he's... kinda the new Fire Lord? Like he runs the country now and is helping to steer it in a good direction. And he's not doing bad so far!
You're quite the character, aren't you, Yumeko? You got the fighting, competitive spirit that would make an excellent bender in my world!
Really? Being able to sense every twitch from other people's bodies, every heightened or sharp breath, knowing when they're getting turned on, that's not the least bit hot to you?

I wouldn't really think of it like that... He's kinda been oblivious to my affections. But now that I think of it, getting down and dirty around you guys could help me be more forward about my feelings towards him.
Pretty much. And if you were to fly, or airbend, I couldn't sense a thing. That's how my friend Aang wound up beating me the first time we met...
That's all I want out of life, really. And hey, I eventually made up with my dad! Though saving his life and his plant from rogue spirits probably helped sweeten the deal.
That is a good skill to have. It's hard to read people beneath the surface sometimes, apart from telling when they're lying. And hey, I used to pull scams when I was younger, so I can't judge.
What, Appa? Uh, I guess he's cute. I wouldn't know how he looks, but he is very furry. It's more like a matted, kinda itchy fur.
...Actually, I think he died from a boomerang hit to the head and blew himself up. It was kind of strange.
Well, he sure took my lessons to heart. I taught that guy everything he knows about earthbending. So in a way, I had the last laugh!
No, badgermoles. Giant, blind creatures that see with earthbending, like me!
It used to be a lot more. Aang would take us for journeys on his flying bison Appa, and I had to help take down an airship at one point!
Hey, any spirit who goes up against the Blind Bandit deserves what's coming to 'em. Especially if they hurt my friends.

They all balance each other out, yeah. And helping maintain that balance is what the Avatar cycle is be for! The Avatar is supposed to keep the peace and balance between the four nations. I should know, I helped him last time this was a problem.
Oh, hearing your voices helps for sure. But even if you don't, I can still sense all of you through your vibrations on the ~background.surface~!
Exactly! It's also part of why I'm less worried about losing my clothes--my seismic sense also lets me sense all of your bodies under your clothing as well! So it's like we're all naked!
Yeah... and there's a lot to be said for sensing other people's heart rates shoot way up as I'm taking off my clothes, too. Like they're getting as excited as I am!
Well, not killing people is... certainly an admirable goal.

Yeah, it mostly becomes noticeable when I'm talking about something that is not on the ground, like if it's in the water or flying... and now I realize how awkward it is to say this to someone with wings.
Kicking butt and teaching people about life. All in a ~background.time~'s work!
Well, it was weird walking around with boots, and I needed some help getting around at first, but I got the hang of it eventually. Helped that all my friends were there.
You have no idea. And getting out of that desert afterwards? The worst! Sokka drank some kind of spiked cactus juice so he was as useless as I am...
Pretty much. Anyone who's able to keep me on my toes. The last thing I want is a dude who just bends over backwards, whether he's intimidated by me or whatever else.
Water, eh? Interesting... I'll have to ask Katara about that one.
How about that? Earthbenders can't typically control vines, but I know a waterbender who could bend the water in them. May be worth exploring...
Shame. I don't know if I'd want my blindness cured, anyway. Then I couldn't make jokes about it anymore!
No, I'm obviously not a badgermole. Plus, I already told you! I learned seismic sense from them. I learned to see the same way they do.
Well, I can control rocks and dirt using my arms and feet. But I've also learned to do it with metal, and sand to a lesser extent.
Pretty much. For years, the Fire Nation was at war with the Water Tribes, the Air Nomads, and the Earth Kingdom, where I'm from. But we've patched things up now, thanks in part to my help.
Why would I be offended by that? It's their fault they sucked as parents. In any case, I ran away again years later after joining Team Avatar. Can't stand people controlling my life!
Too powerful an opponent, eh? I get that. Well, I'm sure you'll kick his butt someday.
Oh come on. I was twelve, it's not like I was that young. And besides, I beat them all, didn't I? So I don't see the problem!
Something about him dating her before she became the Moon Spirit. I don't know, he doesn't talk about it much.
Kinda. It's not perfect, of course, but I can sense pretty much everything around me as long as it's on the ground with me!
Heh, I'm pretty awesome, aren't I? But seriously, thanks. It means a lot to hear this from a goddess.
Don't I know it. I literally can't see everything there is to see!
Well, to be clear, he and I are the same age. But still, the point is that I taught him everything he knows about earthbending.
Well, people usually go into other rooms to do... things that they don't want others to see. Let's just leave it at that.

Sure was. But the Earth Kingdom could be pretty bad too. Between the kidnapping, the brainwashing, and all the corruption that happened there years ago, there's a reason I'm still not keen to revisit Ba Sing Se...

state.text: Also, my best friend apparently managed to tame a few badgermoles and ride on one before he met me. Not sure how he managed that, but man, I wish that were me...

case.state: You got that right! Besides, this thing will lose its shape without the belt, so why make people wait!
I also had to wear shoes to fully disguise myself as a Fire Nation citizen. Had to tear out the soles of the shoes so I could still see, though.
Biggest difference is that I had to wear shoes in order to disguise myself. I guess I could've worn them today, but why would I need to? The war is over, baby!
Ha! I totally fooled you, didn't I? I didn't bring a swimsuit! I can't swim, remember?
Ha! Did you fall for it? I can't swim, so I didn't wear a swimsuit!
What? With how hot it is in the Fire Nation, it's not uncommon to go commando! Trust me, I'd know.
Come on, ~player~. Don't act like you're not a little turned on by me not wearing any undies under my pants.

The worst part about that place is that it was so cold that I couldn't go barefoot without catching frostbite. And even if I did, it'd just be snow instead of rock. So I was pretty much completely blind!
I haven't even mentioned the worst part: I couldn't see there! The ground was all ice, and I had to wear boots the whole time. It was like a place I was designed to do poorly in!
This is shirt is supposed to say "Let it snow." I know that's a big saying over here. Of course, I can't see it, but I believe it!
This shirt says "Let it snow," right? My friend gave itto me and he said that's what it says, so I'm gonna guess he's telling the truth.
I will say, whoever made this outfit did a good job on it. It's pretty comfy if nothing else. Though I don't get the point of this tail. I guess moose lions do have those, but still.
I mean, sure, it's comfortable, but I cannot imagine fighting in this. I mean, what's this tail on the back even for? Do we really need the moose lion to be anatomically correct?
When I bought this outfit, the guy I ordered it from asked me if I wanted my nose to light up. So I asked him, "What the heck would a blind girl need a glowing nose for, you moron?"
Apparently it's about making it titillating? But I don't really know how to do that since, y'know, I'm freaking blind, so, uh... take a good hard look!

Gee, your heart rate just went up a little, and then plummeted back to the floor. That's helpful.

Ever get chased down by a guy whose limbs are made of metal? Boy, do I have some stories about that!
Yeah, yeah, you're--wait, are you really going for those already?
I see... and is Wikipedia like a library? We once went to the spirit library of Wan Shi Tong, "He Who Knows a Thousand Things."
What, the Spirit World? I've never been there, actually, but my friend Aang went there a few times. Talking to spirits is kinda part of his job.
Niiiice! I was the champion of the Earth Rumbles for a long time. Hey, wanna go for a match sometime?

Well, I don't know what an Obstagoon is, but badgermoles are a native animal of the Earth Kingdom. They're blind, but they sense their surroundings with earthbending like me. What's the Obstagoon like?

Hey, I'd take the compliment myself! Although there is definitely a growing rift between benders and nonbenders in my world. It even led to a big fight that I had to take care of in Gao Ling a few years ago.
Really? That's so cool! You and Aang would get along. What are some of the things the animals tell you?
Ha! I knew it! I was about to say it's like you're getting a little kick out of playing the game!
Well... That doesn't sound very ethical, to say the least. But I get the sense from how you're tensing up that you have reservations about that?
That's... that's what waterbending is... well, manipulating it, but not creating it. And wait, what do you mean you're a goddess?

Ah, fighting is one of life's joys. What draws you to the fight? Is it the physical action? The way it gets your heart pounding? Something else?
A demon? That's cool! I haven't met any demons before, though I fought a spirit once! ...Wait. You aren't gonna do anything evil, are you? I know there are good spirits and bad spirits...
Oh, you're excitable alright. I can tell. I can also tell you're ly-iiiing!
Yeah, I noticed that. They don't respond like the metals I'm familiar with.
Hey, do whatever makes you feel good, right? I'll be just as happy either way.
Wait... Is that how you're planning on stripping? Huh... I mean, I guess I was wondering since you were already naked, but still.
It's a shame you're losing your ~clothing~. ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ looked great on you!

Yeah, okay, that's acceptable under the circumstances.
Not too annoyed by that choice, honestly. Not like I've shown any skin yet.

Are you freaking kidding me, ~name~?
Hey, dweeb! Not really helping me out there, y'know?

...You know what I just heard? "Blah, blah, scientific gibberish, blah, blah, something about articles."

Sounds like it's kinda like the thrill I get from fighting! Part of what drove me to the Earth Rumble Tournaments to begin with.

...You know, I'd say you were lying, but I can tell you're not--your heartbeat hasn't sped much more than usual. So either you really are a goddess, or you're the best liar in the world.

...Well, that was an underwhelming answer. Next round!
The power of earth, huh? You and I may have more in common than I'd thought.
...Hey, Sweetheart. I'm blind and even I can see that you're more excited by this than any of us.
Ha! I got you there, didn't I? ...But seriously, I have no idea how ~clothing.ifPlural(they look|it looks)~.
They don't always like the nicknames I give them, but that won't stop me!
We have way more rounds left in this game, ~name~. Eventually you're gonna have to do more than that.
Hey, next time we meet, remind me not to talk to you, since you take this long getting to the point.

state.text: Boy, if this is how stressed you're getting when taking off small stuff, I can't wait until you remove something bigger.

case.state: Don't look so self-assured, ~name~. You'll be right here with me before you know it.
Still can't believe you outlasted me...
Touching yourself is kinda like fighting. Except not at all. But I find myself worn out after doing both for a long time.
Next round! I think I got this one!

Finally, we're getting to the good stuff!

Now we're getting somewhere! ~Name~, you rule!

...I can work with this.

Hmm... feeling you getting all nervous doing this... it's kinda making me a bit tingly myself.
Sweetness! We're getting something real this time!

A little late to be taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, if I'm being honest... but what the heck, better late than never.

If you need any help taking those off, I'm always down.
Finally, some good choices in this game.
What? Just because I'm blind, don't think I can't appreciate a guy getting naked.
Hey, I've already got my pants off, now you've got your ~clothing~ off. Only seems fair to me!
I'm sure if I could see, I'd be very impressed.
No need to hide anything from me, ~name~. Seriously, don't even bother trying.
I've waited this long for other guys to start taking off some real stuff. I'm gonna savor this as much as I can.
Here, ~name~. Maybe I can give you some motivation to lose more.
I hear people are into these. Does this help?
Not that I don't appreciate it, ~name~, I'm just... surprised I did so poorly. And a little mad.
What the heck. I've been waiting this entire game, I can still appreciate it.
M-more like that, please!
N-now if you could just lose a few more times, that would be great!
Yeah, ~name~! Take it off! ...You are stripping, right?
You know, I'd probably be a lot more excited if I could actually feel you, or have any sense of what you look like.
...She is stripping, right, ~player~? I can't tell if she's cheating or not.
...Right, I just said your name. So Sweetheart you're not at all concerned about the gaping hole I'm sensing? Because I'd be pretty concerned if I had that.
Yeah, yeah, but which would win in a fight? Your fuddy-duddy knowledge, or a swift boulder to the face?
Huh. And what about your own history? Were there a lot of gamblers in your family, or where you went to school?
That makes sense. It's a good way of learning, isn't it? When you're faced with a truly worthy opponent with new skills you don't know.
Ooh! A spy? A soldier? That's so cool! Do you do a lot of fighting?
Kineticists? Well, I guess it makes sense for there to be different terms for different worlds. Is kineticism something that people are born with, or that they learn over time, or a mix of both?
Whoa! When volcanoes in our world erupt, they don't usually release a bunch of animals; they mostly just blow up and destroy stuff. So what do Fizz and the other djinn do, anyway?

Oh, gimme a break. I can sense your heartrate through the ~background.surface~, and it just shot through the roof when I even mentioned ~player~'s name.
You don't even know if it's real? Geez, that's gotta suck if you spend all that time looking and it never shows up. Any luck finding it so far?
Whoa! I've never sensed anything like that before...
Daring. I like that.
Did Shamiko just... disappear? Wait, no, she's back... and she's wearing more stuff? How is that allowed?!

Hahaha! I can't tell if I'm really good at this game or you just wanna take off your clothes. Either way, point for Toph!
Wow, you're already taking your ~clothing~ off? Maybe I'm better at this game than I thought...
Whoa. That's something important, isn't it? Your heart's beating faster.

You're getting ever closer to joining me in the Land of the Nude. No shirt, no shoes, no rules!
Heh. Keep this up, you might have to go at it before me!

Now that's more like it.

Mmm... just like that... don't let me down...

Animal companions can always be helpful. But what are the djinn's powers? Appa and Momo, Aang's companions on our travels, could both fly--sky bison were the original airbenders, in fact.

Don't worry, ~name~. It'll be hard to disappoint me, seeing how I already know what you're packing.

Whoa, already? I kind of thought I'd be more naked here... Not that I'm complaining! What do you got?
I haven't been around a lot of guys with their things out. Not that it really matters, of course.
Nervous? I can tell. And I am, too, to be honest...
I'm gonna be real, sensing you strip while I'm this undressed... it's kind of doing things for me.

Wow! I'm marveling alright! I'm sure others could appreciate this more than me, but I'm still impressed!

Pff, duh! If I can sense ants crawling on an anthill several feet away from me, of course I can sense when you're popping out of your ~clothing~ under your other clothes.
I've been meaning to ask, what kinda school did you go to, anyway? Even outside of the Earth Kingdom, I've never heard of a school where gambling was not only permitted, but encouraged.

Wow! Already? I think you're the best opponent I have!

All right! The moment we've all been waiting for!
I'm getting surprisingly worked up by this... is it the vibrations? That must be it.
Well, no more stalling, ~name~. Time to find out what you're working with!
So soon in the game, and you're already showing your chest while I haven't lost anything. I'm good at this!

That's the stuff! I think I'm liking this game!
Uh, not bad. I mean, I feel like I should say something, but it's hard when I could already tell their size earlier, you know?

My crotch is out, your crotch will soon be out. At the end of all this, we'll all be pantsless and shameless!

Hey, lovebirds! If you're gonna fight, I want in on the action!
Hey, lovebirds! Are you gonna fight all day, or are we gonna go back to playing the game?

state.text: I guess I've never thought about it that way. That could be attractive. And you know, there is something to be said for anyone who can match my wit.

case.state: Well... kudos for sticking to your guns, at least. I've certainly put my own neck on the line in helping my friends and helping prevent wars from happening.
